contract_items.content: Generate final project state with routing decision

evidence.description: Final project state generated with 80/100 complexity score, extended discovery routing, and complete database restructuring scope including timeline, risks, and success factors.

contract_items.content: Create routing documentation with next steps

evidence.description: Comprehensive routing documentation created with extended discovery phases, database restructuring scope, implementation timeline, and success criteria for the complex schema overhaul project.

contract_items.content: Update workflow state to complete assessment

evidence.description: Workflow state updated to 'discovery_assessment_complete' with assessment_complete and transition_ready flags set, marking successful completion of MCP discovery workflow.

contract_items.content: Generate transition plan for next phase

evidence.content: Transition plan generated for Extended Discovery Phase 1: Schema design and planning phase outlined with 4-phase implementation approach, risk mitigation strategies, and stakeholder communication plan for the complex database restructuring project.
